pages.text: If you promote to Player you accept the following Rules.

pages.title: Respect Others
pages.text: There's no need$() to say or do things to make others feel bad or upset.$(br2)Trolling, generally defined as provoking a person/situation to get a response, is also not allowed.

pages.title: Offensive Content
pages.text: While some $(o)minor amount$() of swearing is allowed, severe or frequent vulgarity, especially when directed at others, is not.

pages.title: Family friendly chat
pages.text: Chat should be family friendly.$(br)This means certain subjects are not allowed in chat.$(br2)These include, but are not limited to, discussions about sex, politics, religion or drugs.

pages.title: No Advertising
pages.text: Advertising other $(o)Minecraft Servers$() or other $(o)Discord Servers$() is strictly banned.$(br2)You also may not advertise:$(li)Websites$(li)YT Channels$(li)Twitch Streams$(br2)Or anything else if it's not related to the Aged Modpack Server.

pages.title: No Spamming
pages.text: $(o)Spamming is filling the chat with multiple unneeded characters or messages.$()$(br2)Don't do it.$(br2)This rule also applies to spamming commands that don't necessarily show up in chat.

pages.title: No Cheating
pages.text: Cheating in any form isn't allowed.$(br2)$(o)Anything that is considered to give you an unfair advantage over other players is considered cheating.$()$(br2)This can include but isn't limited to:$(li)Client mods$(li)Abusing server bugs$(li)Duplicating items / blocks$(li)Generating things while afk

pages.title: No Griefing
pages.text: $(o)Griefing is considered destroying or changing another players property or bulidings without their consent in any protected area.$()$(br2)This includes stealing as well.

pages.title: Don't Scam
pages.text: $(o)Scamming is taking money, items, work, or anything else of value from another player dishonestly.$()
